attributes.action: Make a legal graffiti wall in Salisbury, Wiltshire
attributes.background: Salisbury has graffiti all over, all in the wrong places! We need a legal place to be allowed to do our own individual art peices so its not being done in illegal places! Salisbury is probably one of very few cities that doesn't have one.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
